options.content: Dashboard - Reversy Kiln - Overview

targets.rawSql: SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000) AS "From"
SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) AS "To"
SELECT (${__to} - ${__from})/1000

SELECT 
  TWait1 AS "Drawer Sampling",
  TWait2 AS "Valves Maintenance",
  TWait3 AS "Hydraulic Oil Unit Maintenance",
  TWait4 AS "Hydraulic Oil Plant Maintenance",
  TWait5 AS "Blower Maintenance",
  TWait6 AS "Skip Maintenance",
  TWait7 AS "Weighed Hopper Calibration",
  TWait8 AS "Coal Weighed Tank Calibration",
  TWait9 AS "Other Maintenance"
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT 
  TOff1 AS "Mechanical Issue Time",
  TOff2 AS "Electrical Issue Time",
  TOff3 AS "Process Issue Time",
  TOff4 AS "Other Issue Time"
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    TStop
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from MIN(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  (extract(epoch from MAX(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(TStop) AS "Cycle Disabled"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    TWait1,
    TWait2,
    TWait3,
    TWait4,
    TWait5,
    TWait6,
    TWait7,  
    TWait8,
    TWait9 
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time AS "To Time",
  (extract(epoch from MIN(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  (extract(epoch from MAX(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(TWait1) AS "Drawer Sampling",
  SUM(TWait2) AS "Valves Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait3) AS "Hydraulic Oil Unit Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait4) AS "Hydraulic Oil Plant Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait5) AS "Blower Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait6) AS "Skip Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait7) AS "Weighed Hopper Calibration",
  SUM(TWait8) AS "Coal Weighed Tank Calibration",
  SUM(TWait9) AS "Other Maintenance"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    TOff1, 
    TOff2,
    TOff3,
    TOff4
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from MIN(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  (extract(epoch from MAX(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(TOff1) AS "Mechanical Issue Time",
  SUM(TOff2) AS "Electrical Issue Time",
  SUM(TOff3) AS "Process Issue Time",
  SUM(TOff4) AS "Other Issue Time"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    LCY, LSCYsp, LSCYpv
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(LSCYsp) AS "Limestone Setpoint",
  SUM(LSCYpv) AS "Limestone",
  SUM(LCY) AS "Lime"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.description: The value is compared to the value from the preceding period of the same duration

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    SUM(LSCYpv) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    SUM(LSCYpv) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

panels.title: Total - Limestone

panels.description: Rate calculated over the entire selected period

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at AS time_start,
    created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second') AS time_end,
    LSCYpv AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
)
SELECT
  SUM(value) / extract(epoch from (max(time_end) - min(time_start))) * 3.6 AS "Limestone Rate"
FROM temp

panels.title: Mean Rate - Limestone

panels.description: Rate calculated over the entire selected period

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at AS time_start,
    created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second') AS time_end,
    LCY AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
)
SELECT
  SUM(value) / extract(epoch from (max(time_end) - min(time_start))) * 3.6 AS "Lime Rate"
FROM temp

panels.title: Mean Rate - Lime

panels.description: The value is compared to the value from the preceding period of the same duration

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    'previous' AS period,
    SUM(LCY) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'current' AS period,
    SUM(LCY) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

panels.title: Total - Lime

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    NP
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time AS time_start,
  time + (${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond') AS time_end,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(NP) AS "Nominal Production"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(NP) AS average
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(NP) AS average
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    NP AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MIN(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    HCpv, HCsp
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(HCsp) AS "Heat Consumption Setpoint",
  AVG(HCpv) AS "Heat Consumption"
  
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(HCpv) AS mean
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(HCpv) AS mean
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    HCpv AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MIN(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    FCYpv, FCYsp
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(FCYsp) AS "Fuel for Cycle Setpoint",
  SUM(FCYpv) AS "Fuel for Cycle"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    SUM(FCYpv) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    SUM(FCYpv) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    FCYpv AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MIN(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    FFpv, FFsp
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(FFsp) AS "Fuel Flow Setpoint",
  AVG(FFpv) AS "Fuel Flow"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(FFpv) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(FFpv) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    FFpv AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MIN(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days'

      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    CAF
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(CAF) AS "Combustion Air Flow"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(CAF) AS value
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(CAF) AS value
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    CAF AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MIN(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    EANpv, EANsp
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(EANsp) AS "Combustion Air Index Setpoint",
  AVG(EANpv) AS "Combustion Air Index"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(EANpv) AS value
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(EANpv) AS value
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    EANpv AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MIN(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    CMB1pv, CMB2pv, CMB3pv
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(CMB1pv) AS "Combustion Air Blower 1 - Speed",
  AVG(CMB2pv) AS "Combustion Air Blower 2 - Speed",
  AVG(CMB3pv) AS "Combustion Air Blower 3 - Speed"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    CMB1pv AS value1,
    CMB2pv AS value2,
    CMB3pv AS value3
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Blower 1 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MIN(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Blower 1 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MAX(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Blower 2 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MIN(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Blower 2 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MAX(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Blower 3 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value3 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value3 = (SELECT MIN(value3) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Blower 3 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value3 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value3 = (SELECT MAX(value3) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

matcher.options: Shaft 1 - Lances cooling / Final injection air pressure
Shaft 2 - Lances cooling / Final injection air pressure

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    CLAP, LCAPS1, LCAPS2
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(LCAPS1) AS "Shaft 1 - Lances cooling / Final injection air pressure",
  AVG(LCAPS2) AS "Shaft 2 - Lances cooling / Final injection air pressure",
  AVG(CLAP) AS "Lime Cooling Air Pressure"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(CLAP) AS value
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(CLAP) AS value
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    CLAP AS value1,
    LCAPS1 AS value2,
    LCAPS2 AS value3
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'Global - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MIN(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Global - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MAX(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'Shaft 1 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MIN(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

matcher.options: Skip side Shaft 1 - LT1 (Inspection door ZS204101)
Skip side Shaft 1 - LT8 (Inspection door ZS204108)

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days'

      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)

      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    LT1, LT8
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)

  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,

  AVG(LT8) AS "Skip side Shaft 1 - LT8 (Inspection door ZS204108)"

ORDER BY time ASC;

  SELECT

    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'LT1 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MIN(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'LT1 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MAX(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'LT8 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MIN(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'LT8 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MAX(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

panels.title: Boundary Cycles - Lime Temperature - Skip Side Shaft 1

matcher.options: Skip side Shaft 2 - LT9 (Inspection door ZS204101)
Skip side Shaft 2 - LT16 (Inspection door ZS204108)

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute' 
        THEN created_at
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    LT9, LT16
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(LT9) AS "Skip side Shaft 2 - LT9 (Inspection door ZS204101)",
  AVG(LT16) AS "Skip side Shaft 2 - LT16 (Inspection door ZS204108)"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CY, 
    LT9 AS value1,
    LT16 AS value2
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
(SELECT 'LT9 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MIN(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'LT9 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value1 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value1 = (SELECT MAX(value1) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'LT16 - Min' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MIN(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT 'LT16 - Max' AS "Type", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date", TO_CHAR(created_at, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time", CY AS "Cycle", value2 AS "Value", created_at FROM data
WHERE value2 = (SELECT MAX(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 minute'

  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,

UNION ALL

WHERE value2 = (SELECT MIN(value2) FROM data) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT name,  comment
FROM tags.$tag_table
WHERE label IN ( $label )
--ORDER BY name

list.description: Select the endpoint representing the data source from which data will be retrieved.
list.label: Endpoint
list.name: endpoint
endpoint_id

list.description: Select the correct tag table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard variables.
list.label: Tag Table
list.name: tag_table

list.definition:
SELECT data_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'
list.description: Select the correct data table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard data.
list.label: Table
list.name: data_table
list.query:
SELECT data_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'

list.label: Label
list.name: label

list.definition:
SELECT name
FROM tags.${tag_table}
WHERE label IN ( $label )
AND name != 'CY'
list.label: variables
list.name: variables
list.query:
SELECT name
FROM tags.${tag_table}
WHERE label IN ( $label )
AND name != 'CY'

list.description: compute time range for postgres in seconds
list.label: Time Range
list.name: time_range

list.definition:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN '${aggregation}' = 'None' THEN 0
        ELSE EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM '${interval_text}'::INTERVAL) * 1000
    END AS interval_ms;
list.name: interval_ms
list.query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN '${aggregation}' = 'None' THEN 0
        ELSE EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM '${interval_text}'::INTERVAL) * 1000
    END AS interval_ms;

list.name: title
